env.name: RESULT_FIELD
env.description: The field you'd like to get the result of.

env.name: TABLE_NAME
env.description: The table name. Found on the left of the "+" button. The first table's default is "Table 1".

env.name: WHERE_FIELD
env.description: The field name used for the "where" parameter. In this case, the "where" parameter is checking whether the field's value is greater than a certain number.

env.name: WHERE_VALUE
env.description: The number the value of the WHERE_FIELD must be greater than.
